title: A Robot Dog Named Bolt
prompt: Write a short story about a robot dog
preview: A Robot Dog Named Bolt The Companion In the bustling, neon-lit streets of Neo-San, Bolt was more than a machine. He was a robotic companion with sleek silver fur and expressive LED eyes that changed color based on emotions. Created by Dr. Elara Voss, Bolt was designed to assist humans with tasks ran...
